examples: The market had vibrant yellow lemons on display.
Many lanes are desecrated with yellow lines.
She drew a yellow sun on the corner of the paper.
They planted yellow flowers in the garden to attract bees.
We finally settled on a soft yellow for the kitchen walls.
words.defineEn: having the color of lemons or the sun
words.defineVi: có màu chanh hoặc mặt trời

examples: The success of a business is only as great as the least successful department within it, as a chain is only as strong as its weakest link.
She said hello to me and I went weak in the knees.
Tim had been sick for a week, and he was still as weak as a kitten.
But the problem is that Lady Macbeth states that Macbeth is weak for having too much milk of human kindness.
The announcement made me weak at the knees.
words.defineEn: not physically strong; having little energy or physical strength
words.defineVi: thể chất không cường tráng; có ít năng lượng hoặc sức mạnh thể chất

examples: Extreme solutions to problems always lead to difficulties.
He went to extreme lengths to learn the truth.
The different cabling systems are becoming more and more of a problem, testing the patience of planners and private network operators to the extreme.
The politician acknowledged that extremes meet, and that the most polarized political views often shared underlying fears and concerns about the future.
Sarah couldn't handle the extreme motion of the roller coaster and ended up tossing her cookies all over the ground.
words.defineEn: very high in intensity or degree
words.defineVi: cường độ hoặc mức độ rất cao

examples: She guessed the answer straight away.
The guard stood straight as a ramrod.
They clicked straight away.
He gives it to you straight.
Sometimes he spoke straight from the shoulder and sometimes in puzzles
words.defineEn: without bending or curving in any angle or direction
words.defineVi: không uốn cong hoặc uốn cong theo bất kỳ góc độ hoặc hướng nào

examples: I'm not really that concerned with nonprofit work.
And employees are understandably concerned.
Others were more concerned about alcohol’s potential for abuse.
So, people are concerned about this trend.
At the same time, world leaders remain concerned about the vaccines equitable distribution.
words.defineEn: describing someone who is worried or anxious
words.defineVi: mô tả ai đó đang lo lắng hoặc lo lắng

examples: Regular exercise is essential for the healthfulness of your body and mind.
The presence of certain fungi, like Penicillium, is essential in the production of some types of cheese.
She kept her essential oils in a small glass bottle.
The stove is an essential appliance in every kitchen.
Including homogenized milk in your diet provides essential nutrients like calcium and vitamin D.
words.defineEn: being very important or necessary
words.defineVi: là rất quan trọng hoặc cần thiết

examples: Its skin feels really smooth.
When we were little and were getting on Grandpa's last nerve, she smoothed his ruffled feathers.
Adding crème fraîche to mashed potatoes gives them a silky smooth texture and a subtle tang.
We'll be in smooth waters if we can secure a new loan extension from the bank.
She used a brush to smooth out the knots in her hair.
words.defineEn: having an even surface without any holes or lumps
words.defineVi: có bề mặt phẳng không có lỗ hoặc cục

examples: She made a mental note to ask Alan about it.
Your brain needs mental stimulation to stay sharp, so if you don't challenge yourself intellectually, your cognitive abilities will decline - use it or lose it.
After attending the seminar on mental health, I became awake to the stigma surrounding mental illness and decided to become an advocate for greater awareness and understanding.
He was declared insane and ordered to be detained in a mental hospital at Her Majesty's pleasure.
Mental illness changes all the time.
words.defineEn: of or relating to someone's mind
words.defineVi: của hoặc liên quan đến tâm trí của một ai đó

examples: Complaints must go through the proper channels.
They should have had proper evidence before I was charged.
The dentist showed me the proper technique for brushing and gave me a new toothbrush.
Can you show me the proper way to hold the violin bow?
The knee-jerk reaction to this is to call for proper security in all hospitals.
words.defineEn: suitable or appropriate for the situation; according to what is required
words.defineVi: phù hợp hoặc phù hợp với hoàn cảnh; theo những gì được yêu cầu

examples: She was surprised to find Chinese cabbage at the grocery store.
I'm really surprised that the sequel even holds a candle to the original.
When I tasted the white sauce for the first time, I was pleasantly surprised by its delicate balance of flavors.
She was surprised to find that everyone had left.
Mark was surprised to find out that his close friend, Alex, swings both ways.
words.defineEn: feeling or showing surprise or wonder
words.defineVi: cảm thấy hoặc thể hiện sự ngạc nhiên hoặc thắc mắc

examples: International companies set the price of oil.
Her latest novel takes the lid off the international art world.
A successful investor has his finger on the pulse of international business.
Remuneration is in line with comparable international organizations.
Being assigned to the General Secretariat provided a worm's-eye view of international diplomacy.
words.defineEn: happening in or between more than one country
words.defineVi: xảy ra trong hoặc giữa nhiều quốc gia

examples: I was having difficulty in staying awake.
After a quick run in the park, I felt more awake and energized, ready to tackle the rest of my day.
After attending the seminar on mental health, I became awake to the stigma surrounding mental illness and decided to become an advocate for greater awareness and understanding.
But before long, I knew I had nurtured a snake in my bosom, as I awoke one morning to find myself robbed blind!
I stayed awake.
words.defineEn: not in a state of sleep or unconsciousness
words.defineVi: không ở trạng thái ngủ hoặc bất tỉnh

examples: German engineering is highly regarded for its precision and quality.
The German language is widely spoken in Germany and other European countries.
The German education system is highly regarded for its emphasis on academic excellence.
I wouldn't call German an easy language.
Let's serve traditional German dishes.
words.defineEn: relating to Germany or its people or language
words.defineVi: liên quan đến nước Đức hoặc con người hoặc ngôn ngữ của nó

examples: My mother spoke Russian.
Did you really get to third base with that Russian chick like in the movie?
Russian collusion, give me a break.
Russian hackers had already breached American government computer networks.
Russian forces shot the first round.
words.defineEn: relating to Russia or its people or language
words.defineVi: liên quan đến Nga hoặc con người hoặc ngôn ngữ của nó

examples: The film was so scary I was shaking in my boots.
He watched a scary movie and got scared during the suspenseful scenes.
They never watch scary movies because they find them too frightening.
The car accident was scary, but thankfully no one was seriously injured - nothing so bad but might have been worse.
Moving to a new city was scary, but it was also a chance for him to spread his wings and start a new chapter in his life.
words.defineEn: making us feel fear
words.defineVi: khiến chúng ta cảm thấy sợ hãi

examples: The constant noise from the construction site vexed the residents of the neighborhood.
The baby’s constant crying drove me to distraction.
Your constant tapping is driving me up the wall!
Her constant criticism really makes my hackles rise!
His constant invasion of her privacy was driving her to distraction.
words.defineEn: happening continuously over a long period of time
words.defineVi: xảy ra liên tục trong thời gian dài

examples: The bartender served a cocktail in a fancy glass.
Hey Noah, fancy taking a spin to the grocery store with me?
The vision seems a flight of fancy.
They really fancy themselves after only one hit song!
He writes his thoughts and ideas in a journal with a fancy pen.
words.defineEn: elaborate in structure and with a lot of decorations
words.defineVi: xây dựng trong cấu trúc và với rất nhiều đồ trang trí

examples: Don't be scared to speak to him.
He watched a scary movie and got scared during the suspenseful scenes.
I was really scared when I encountered a bear in the wilderness.
You've got your rivals running scared.
The young boy was scared of the rocking boat at first, but his grandfather helped him find his sea legs and they spent the day fishing together.
words.defineEn: afraid of something or someone
words.defineVi: sợ một cái gì đó hoặc một ai đó

examples: Her groundbreaking research has revolutionized the scientific community.
Budget cuts are putting the squeeze on scientific research.
We discuss current scientific advancements and discoveries in science class.
This scientific uncertainty is likely to run and run.
This particular heritage may be a millstone around the neck of scientific natural history.
words.defineEn: relating to or involving science
words.defineVi: liên quan đến hoặc liên quan đến khoa học

examples: The library is often quiet during weekdays.
Be quiet, please.
We lead a very quiet life.
Surprisingly, the quiet neighborhood came alive with vibrant festivities during the annual festival.
You've been awfully quiet tonight, honey.
words.defineEn: making very little noise or no noise at all
words.defineVi: tạo ra rất ít tiếng ồn hoặc không có tiếng ồn nào cả

examples: The sudden noise made her start.
I got a sudden pain in my left eye.
The news of his sudden death stunned everyone.
The sudden fame has turned her head, making her behave arrogantly and disregard others' opinions.
Startled by the sudden appearance of a ghost, he let out a cry of horror.
words.defineEn: taking place unexpectedly or done quickly
words.defineVi: diễn ra bất ngờ hoặc thực hiện một cách nhanh chóng

examples: This class is intense!
The actor's intense bedroom eyes added an extra layer of allure to his performance.
The intense gaze from across the room, eyes on stalks, left no doubt about his attraction.
Keeping his shirt on during intense moments.
I love the intense flavor of black currants in my morning smoothie.
words.defineEn: very extreme or great
words.defineVi: rất cực đoan hoặc tuyệt vời

examples: The California vineyards produce excellent wines.
Camembert is an excellent choice for a picnic.
She would have made an excellent teacher.
Liz Quinn was considered an excellent teacher.
Regular investment of small amounts of money is an excellent way of building a nest egg.
words.defineEn: extremely good in quality or other traits
words.defineVi: cực kỳ tốt về chất lượng hoặc các đặc điểm khác

examples: The music was far too loud for my liking.
The branch broke with a loud snap.
The loud noise made me jump out of my skin.
He gave a loud cry and fell to the floor.
The loud crash made everyone in the room sit up and take notice.
words.defineEn: making a lot of noise
words.defineVi: gây ồn ào

examples: I have a digital clock on my bedside table that shows the time in numbers.
With everything going digital and online, we're going to need some fresh blood if we want to remain a viable company in today's market.
Digital grocery is the next big battleground in e-commerce.
One of them is digital literacy.
In its second quarter of 2019, digital sales nearly doubled.
words.defineEn: (of signals or data) storing, using, or relating to data as series of the digits 0 and 1 in electronic signals
words.defineVi: (của tín hiệu hoặc dữ liệu) lưu trữ, sử dụng hoặc liên quan đến dữ liệu dưới dạng chuỗi các chữ số 0 và 1 trong tín hiệu điện tử
